title: Coast to Coast AM - 06-24-10 - Numerology & Psychic Predictions
description:
Date:
 06-24-10
 
Host:
 George Noory
 
Guests:
 Glynis McCants, Joseph Jacobs 
 


In the first half of the show, numerologist Glynis McCants offered analysis of the numbers behind celebrities and events in the news: 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢In running a numbers chart for Sandra Bullock & Jesse James, they shared four out of six "challenge" numbers to their relationship-- "She did not know him at all." 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Al & Tipper Gore also shared four out of six "challenge" numbers, but had the same lifepath number (the most important number)-- This helped them deal with stressful incidents over the years.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢The oil spill which occurred on April 20th was on a "9" day, which suggests "a lesson to be learned here" and that we should never let it happen again. 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Joran van der Sloot, put in jail for murder, was in an "8" year cycle-- which means you can run, but you can't hide. In this cycle, if you're up to no good, you're going to get caught.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Obama is in personal year of "6"-- a year of power, but he will face a big event or crisis in August.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢The year 2012 is a "5" year (2 + 0 +1 + 2 = 5), and five always promotes drama. We'll see people working together to help save the planet. 
------------------------------------------- 

In the latter half of the program, psychic Joseph Jacobs shared his predictions and intuitions for the rest of 2010: 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢July-- new inventions, dictators taking action, difficult weather/water conditions (during the first two weeks). 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢August-- possible explosions related to military or terrorist actions.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢September-- an expressive, confusing month, with things going in many different directions.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢October-- a very constructive time, with a lot of building going on.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢November-- a time for major change, not just US elections, but worldwide.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢December-- wet and heavy weather. 
On his website, Jacobs offers a kind of psychic day planner, with tips for the individual week ahead.
